content.question: What is the total mechanical energy of the rocket-Earth system at <math alttext="t equals 5.0 seconds" overflow="scroll"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>5.0</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="4.0 times 10 to the 5 power joules" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>
<math alttext="5.2 times 10 to the 5 power joules" overflow="scroll"><mn>5.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>

<math alttext="14.0 times 10 to the 5 power joules" overflow="scroll"><mn>14.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="9.0 times 10 to the 5 power joules" overflow="scroll"><mn>9.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>
